-spec find_minimum_operations(S1 :: unicode:unicode_binary(), S2 :: unicode:unicode_binary(), S3 :: unicode:unicode_binary()) -> integer().
find_minimum_operations(S1, S2, S3) ->
    MinOperations = find_operations(S1, S2, S3, 0),
    case MinOperations of
        {ok, Ops} -> Ops;
        error -> -1
    end.

find_operations(S1, S2, S3, Ops) when byte_size(S1) =:= 0; byte_size(S2) =:= 0; byte_size(S3) =:= 0 ->
    if 
        byte_size(S1) =:= 0 andalso byte_size(S2) =:= 0 andalso byte_size(S3) =:= 0 ->
            {ok, Ops};
        true -> 
            error
    end;
find_operations(S1, S2, S3, Ops) ->
    [C1|_] = binary:bin_to_list(S1),
    [C2|_] = binary:bin_to_list(S2),
    [C3|_] = binary:bin_to_list(S3),
    if 
        C1 =:= C2, C2 =:= C3 ->
            find_operations(binary:part(S1, {1, byte_size(S1) - 1}), binary:part(S2, {1, byte_size(S2) - 1}), binary:part(S3, {1, byte_size(S3) - 1}), Ops);
        true ->
            MinSize = min(min(byte_size(S1), byte_size(S2)), byte_size(S3)),
            try_reduce(S1, S2, S3, MinSize, Ops)
    end.

try_reduce(S1, S2, S3, MinSize, Ops) ->
    case MinSize of
        0 -> error; % Cannot reduce further, strings are different
        _ ->
            Ops1 = case byte_size(S1) > MinSize of true -> 1; false -> 0 end,
            Ops2 = case byte_size(S2) > MinSize of true -> 1; false -> 0 end,
            Ops3 = case byte_size(S3) > MinSize of true -> 1; false -> 0 end,
            NewOps = Ops + Ops1 + Ops2 + Ops3,
            NewS1 = if Ops1 > 0 -> binary:part(S1, {0, byte_size(S1) - 1}); true -> S1 end,
            NewS2 = if Ops2 > 0 -> binary:part(S2, {0, byte_size(S2) - 1}); true -> S2 end,
            NewS3 = if Ops3 > 0 -> binary:part(S3, {0, byte_size(S3) - 1}); true -> S3 end,
            find_operations(NewS1, NewS2, NewS3, NewOps)
    end.
